recipe_name: Sticky honey and sesame stir-fried beef with herb salad
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the beef, place the strips of beef into a small bowl, add the chilli flakes, sesame seeds, vegetable oil, Worchestershire sauce, crushed coriander seeds and honey, stir well and leave to marinate for five minutes.  Heat a griddle pan until smoking hot, add the beef strips and griddle for 1-2 minutes. For the herb salad, mix the coriander leaves, parsley leaves, lemon juice, lime juice, olive oil and seasoning together in a large bowl. To serve, pile the herb salad onto a serving plate and top with the griddled beef. Place the lime wedges alongside.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz Organic Welsh black beef steak, cut into strips,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  2 tbsp vegetable oil,  2 tbsp Worchestershire sauce,  ½ tsp crushed coriander seeds ,  1 tbsp honey,  large handful fresh coriander leaves,  large handful fresh flat leaf parsley,  ½ lemon, juice only,  ½ lime, juice only,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 lime, cut into wedges, for garnish
